name: #Trapteam
description:
#TRAPTEAM

TRAPTEAM is a 2D platformer with a twist. In TRAPTEAM you don't control the player, you control the enemy/trap. Your goal is to keep the player from reaching the goal of the level.

Controles
  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • Press R to reset the Level.
  • Press Esc to go back to the Titlescreen.

This Game was made for Wowie! Jam 3.0
